pluginstrument.author: John Parker
pluginstrument.description:
Modification of Jason Tatum's original Attitude gauge Brian McMullan 20180324 Property for background off/on (default ON) Property for dimming overlay (default OFF) Property for Pilot (vac1) or co-pilot (vac2) (XP only) (default vac1) Property for animated or snap fail flag (default ON)
Added Artificial Horizon two-way updates AM to (XP only)
